sources.title: The Appearing
sources.description: A woman once possessed by a mysterious entity uncovers a shocking secret about her past and must face the demon that dwells inside of her.

metadata.Plot: After suffering a tragic loss, a city detective named Michael and his wife move to a small town, where Michael joins the town police force. His first case, involving a missing person, leads him to discover that the town is plagued by a dark supernatural force. Michael will have to summon every ounce of courage in order to fight this darkness before it takes everything from him.
metadata.Actors: Will Wallace, Dean Cain, Don Swayze
